titleStmt.title: Tal Ilan Lexicon, Master List -- Simon-שמעון

person.bibl: Sirach 50:1 (H & R Suppl. 145); AJ 12:43 (Schalit, NB, 113); mAb1:2 (Kasovsky,Mishnae, 1793).
1 Macc 2:3; 2 Macc 8:22 (H & R Suppl. 145); BJ 1:49; AJ 12:266; Vita 3 (Schalit, NB, 113); CIJ, no. 1184.

state.note: Priest, Joseph (131)’s son, of Hezir family
Eleazar (48)’s son, Joseph (99) and Eleazar (47)’s father

person.bibl: Solomon of Basra,Book of the Bee, 106

state.note: Sarah (32) and Alexander (60)’s father, of Ptolemais
Publius (1) Aeleius (1) Obaihan (1)’s father, Obaihan (2)’s son, Julius (2)’s grandfather
